Dialogue.Value: To the Hotel.
It’s a bookshelf with my,manga collection.
Some people find it surprising,that I have more boys’ manga,than girls’ manga.
It’s my PC.,I can jack in.
This powerful PC was actually,a birthday gift from Shanghai.
I have no idea how she got,the money for it....
But now’s not the time to,surf the net!
It’s a model of Wanbu from,the ”Fantasy Robo Zeleib”,anime.
Though Wanbu is an enemy,robo，I like it more than the,hero’s robo.
I build models as a hobby，,and I’m proud my first try went,so well.
There are packs of plastic,models that I plan to build,someday.
Maybe I’ll still enjoy building,models when I’m old.,That’s a scary thought....
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
It appears your Navi was,deleted.
I-I’m sorry....
The blonde Navi in the last,house was stronger than,expected....
....Well，the goal was to,get Ice Programs from,30 refrigerators.
You found enough，so I’m,willing to overlook it this time.
However....,Make sure you don’t lose,next time.
We recovered the backup,memory data，so we’ll,start regrouping soon.
I’m counting on it.,Dismissed.
So this is the first of the,Element Programs....
Mm，you wouldn’t need as,many of them if you’d just go,after higher-quality programs.
What’s the next Element,Program on the list?
The Air Program....
A program from that one place,would be quite pure....
But security is pretty tight,over there.
Then leave it to me.
ROM’s autonomous Navi，,Medicine....
Be careful....,You might run into the Navi,that beat Cirno....
The one who fluked a win,against that weakling Cirno?,Please.
I won’t lose.
Now then，I’m off!
Is it okay to rely on her?
Hmph....,She’s just a doll.
If she fails，just get rid of her,and send another....
The Element Programs are,the keys to the Door....
If we could acquire those,Programs，we’d be in the,clear....
The day after the fridge,incident....
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
....Shanghai?,Are you up?
....Can’t sleep?
Worried about Remilia?
Why，that brat!
....I shouldn’t say that.
I’m partly to blame too.
Even though I was mad，,I went a bit too far.,She’s just a kid.
Tomorrow morning....,Let’s give her a call.
We should apologize.,Don’t you think so?
Good night，Alice.
Good night....
What’s the matter?,Weren’t we going to call,Remilia?
I’m thinking about what to,say first.
Hey! Scaredy-cat!,You can’t just sit around and,think about it all day!
Fine! I’ll just call her myself!
Maybe she’s calling us,from the other end?
Hello? This is Alice.
Alice!,Have you heard anything,from dad or Remilia!?
Mari!? What’s wrong!?
Dad didn’t come home last,night!! He’s not answering,the phone either!
The University’s closed today.,There shouldn’t be anyone,there，but....
I’m going by the University,to make sure everything’s,okay!
Wait! I’ll go with you!
Remilia might still be at the,University too!
Okay，I’ll go ahead!,Catch up with me there!
Dr. Morichika.... Remilia....,I hope you’re both okay.
Worry later!,Go now!
Alice，you’ve got mail.
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
Medicine failed. We’ll have to,put acquiring the Air Program,on hold for now.
Don’t worry. We’ll just call in,another doll to finish the job.
First Cirno and now Medicine,were beaten by that Navi，,Shanghai....
I’ve been collecting data on,her，but I still don’t know much.
Then I will go observe her,abilities firsthand.
You have a plan，DruidMan?
Like I said，don’t worry.,I’ve already made the,necessary arrangements.
Oh? That’s promising.
Well then，let’s finish gathering,data while the NetAgents are,busy chasing Medicine.
Now where would the,Elemental Programs be?,Wind，Earth，Light，Dark....
We can extract the Dark,Program from Dark Chips,in circulation，but....
Fear not.
With ROM’s information,network，we can track them,down instantly.
If we collect them all，,the world will.... Kukuku....
Several days after the,Genso University air purifier,incident....
Aaaaaah!,I’m boooored!
I’m glad it’s so calm.
The haywire fridges....,The air purifiers....
We keep getting caught up in,ROM incidents. My body can’t,take much more of this.
A life with too little excitement,is bad for a girl!
You always say the strangest,things....
Hm?,It’s an email from Dr. Morichika.
Maybe he’s finished analyzing,our compressed data!
Let’s see what it says....
Alice，I have several things,I need to tell you about the,data you brought me.
It’s difficult to explain by email.,Sorry to trouble you，but could,you please stop by my lab?
Alright!,Alice，let’s head to the lab!
Sounds like he’s not done,yet，but let’s go find out!
Alice，you’ve got mail.
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
The next day....
Now，let’s go to school!
Yaawwwn....,So I can sleeeep....
You don’t have to take,classes，so you can sleep,all you want....
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
The next day....
Time to go to school!
I hope I can make friends,with Tenshi!
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
One week later....
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
The next day....
Hey Alice! It’s finally time for,the N1 League’s main event!
Where was it being held,again?
In the Central City Game,Center.,We’ve been there before.
Alice，you’ve got mail!
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
The next day....
Alice! Wake up!,You’ve got mail!
Yaaaawn....,This early in the morning?
Hmmm....,It’s from Tenshi.
Sorry to tell you the morning,of，Alice.
I have to go to the Agent Center,this afternoon!
So I guess I’m going with you,again today!
....So what will we do?
Of course! Let’s go!
Her amulet might have helped,us win the N1 League，after all!
Then I’ll send a reply saying,we’ll go with her.
Now that I’m completely,awake，let’s go eat breakfast!
That afternoon....
It’s about time to meet up,with Tenshi.
We were going to meet in front,of the metro station，right?
Alright，let’s go!
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
The next day....
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
A few days later....
Alice，you’ve got mail!,From a....Sagume?
Huh? Sagume....
Was she the one who helped,with Medicine?
Well，here’s what it says....
It’s been a while，Alice.,Thank you for your help the,other day.
Your work has helped us get,a grasp on the true identity,of those hooded Navis.
I’ll be conducting a debriefing,on the matter on the second,floor of the Agent Center.
You’re not a NetAgent，but,I’d still like you to participate.
It’s okay if you can’t make it，,but please come to the Agent,Center if you can.
....Well? You wanna go?
Do you?....,I don’t really want to，but I,guess we should.
Heh，I know exactly what you,mean.
I guess you should get,dressed then.
Time to head to Eien Town.
Going to the Agent Center,again，huh....
Last we went with Tenshi，now,it’s just us.
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
Greetings.,This is the leader of ROM，and,I bear a message for you all.
The attack on your NetNavis,the other day was merely an,opening act.
We at ROM have prepared,many more methods to plunge,the world into chaos.
Please，behold our acts as the,world bends to our will，for it,shall soon be ours.
So ROM has finally declared,war on the world.
Is there anything we can do?
Alice，you have mail!,It’s from Dr. Morichika.
Dr. Morichika?,What does it say?
I have something I’d like to,speak with you about，,concerning Shanghai.
As it happens，I am at the,NetAgent center right now.
Would you mind coming by,when you have the chance?
About me....?
Let’s go，then.
(I guess it’s time....)
It’s not time to sleep yet.
Ready for bed?
Want to save?
Save complete!
Good night，Alice!
It’s not time to sleep yet.
It was just a dream....?
A sweet dream....
I was only six years old,back then....
Mumble mumble....,That all ya got....?
Sigh....,I should try to go back to sleep.
A few days later....
When Papa went overseas，,he brought back a doll that,looks like Shanghai.
They look like sisters，so I,put them next to each other,in the window.
She was made by a famous,dollmaker whose work is,nearly impossible to get.
I hope I can make dolls as,beautiful as these someday.
It’s a life-sized mirror I use,when I dress up.
I bought a cosmetics kit with it,and tucked away at the foot of,the mirror.
I’ve never used it since I,bought it，but I think I’ll open,it when I’m an adult.
ALERT! ALERT!!,FATAL SYSTEM ERROR,IN DEFENSE DRONES!
They’re not responding to HQ!,We’ve lost control!
Shut them down! Now!
ALL UNITS OUT OF,CONTROL! ALL UNITS,OUT OF CONTROL!!
This world....,will be deleted!!!
Not long after....
Eurica，Biet，and other world,superpowers found that,their drone control systems
were hacked and taken over,by evil scientists.
This threatened not only the,physical world，but also the,digital world.
The Internet became a,warzone，ravaged by cyber,warfare.
This series of Cyber Wars,crippled many great nations.
Japan didn’t use drones at,the time，so its losses were,minimal.
In the end，the Cyber Wars,destroyed all computer,networks.
This sparked a series of,riots later called the,Internet Armageddon.
Humanity realized its reliance,on networks，as the pain of,losing them was too much to
bear.,Thus，humanity sought new,networks.
Dr. Rinnosuke Morichika,proposed his Cyberworld,Theory as the solution.
He was determined to,create a new network.
And now，several decades,later....
Alice，the sun’s already up.
You’re going to be late for,school.
Ah!,I overslept!
My alarm should have woken,me up!,How....
Don’t tell me....
Yaawwwn....,You’re pretty loud this morning.
Shanghai!,You turned off the alarm，,didn’t you!?
It would have disturbed my,beauty sleep.
Jeez!,Why are you so selfish!?
Alice!,Are you awake?
Ah，Mama!,I’ll be right there!
Okay!,Ready to go!
I have to hurry，or I’ll be late,for school!
Alice，you’ve got mail.
You can read mail by,opening the START menu,and selecting Mail!
And if you don’t know where to,go next，press L.
I’ll give you some advice!
A scream....!,Mama!?
Something must have,happened in the living room!,Mama’s in danger!!
Sorry about the wait!
Don’t worry about it!
Alice，did you make this,plastic model yourself?
Yeah，I did.
I read the manga that this,robot is from，but I haven’t,seen the anime.
....Anyway，what’s up?,Did you come over to play?
Not really....,I was wondering if you’d go,with me to Eien Town.
Eien Town?
So the NetAgents’ summons,finally came，huh?
Please go with me!,I’m too scared to go alone!
I don’t mind，but did you ask,Mari or Rika?
We asked everyone else,before you，but they were,all busy.
Then that’s that!,Let’s go!
I’ll wait for you in front of the,metro station!
Got it.
Alright! Ready to go!
If you take the metro，you can,get to Eien Town pretty quickly.
Right!,Let’s go to the station!
Why’re you so depressed?,This isn’t like you.
The shrine would’ve burned,down if we took her to the,hospital right away.
Reimu and her shrine are,safe，and we saved Tenshi,more or less....
Given the situation，you made,the best decision you could.
Hm? An email?
It’s from Tenshi.,I’ll open it.
I’m sending this email from,the hospital.
After my treatment，I just have,to rest and heal!
I’ll be in the hospital for a,week on bed rest.....
But thanks to you，Reimu,and her shrine are okay!
Thank you so much，Alice!
PS: The hospital is boring，,so I’d be really happy if you,paid me a visit!
....That’s it.
Let’s make sure to visit her in,the hospital first thing in the,morning!
....Yeah! Sure thing!
This is the end of the,trial version.
Please look forward to,future versions.
Also，you’ll find a bonus room,in the bottom-left of,Shanghai’s Room.
If you’re confident in your skill，,give it a try.
Hm? What are you dressing,up for? Were we gonna go,somewhere?
What do you mean? We all,decided to visit Tenshi in the,hospital today，remember?
Oh?,Did we?
What a surprise....,Well，let’s head to the hospital.
If I remember correctly，she,was taken to the hospital in,Eien Town.
An email?
Ah，let’s see....,From Henchie?
Excuse me，Mistress Shanghai.,I have something confidential,for your ears only.
Please come to where we ran,into each other in Undernet 2.
Something only for me?
We’ll have to head to,Undernet 2 to find out.
Let’s get on the Net then.
....so when we need your,support，we’ll call you in.
You’ve found their hideout?
The Fujiwara branch of the,Yakuza gave us some leads,on their location.
The Yakuza?
It was something ROM had,overlooked. The Yakuza kept,tabs on them.
Before，they had some sort of,nonagression pact，as long as,nothing hurt their interests.
Even the previous incident with,the Black Navis caused a lot,of upheaval，and threw many
of their operations into chaos.,They took that as a betrayal，,and tipped off a NetAgent.
So what’s stopping you from,just sweeping in?
They’ve got thick defences.,Artillery support，radar,systems，and air coverage.
We’ll need you to find a way,to break into their base.
Who knows，you might find an,obvious solution we’ve missed.,Mouth of babes，and that.
You’ve found ways to beat,ROM many times before.
....Okay，I’ll try to find some,way to help.
We’re relying on you!
I don’t think you’ll have any,problems with simple ideas.
....It’s just frustrating.,I decided to fight，and we’re,still planning.
Why don’t we head over to,Remilia’s?
Why Remilia?
’Cause she’s rich!
Alice，you’ve got mail!
Alice，phone call!,It’s Reisen!
Hello? Reisen?
....Have you recovered from,your wounds，Alice Shinki?
Yeah，I’m okay now.,Is something the matter?
This is a formal request from the,NetAgents for your assistance,in an ongoing matter.
The target is a distributor of,Dark Chips，the “Queen of,Darkness”.
“Queen of Darkness”，huh?,What kind of name is that?
I don’t think you have any room,to talk，Shanghai.
The codename was selected,by NetAgent analysts and the,lead investigator.
Still，Dark Chips are bad news,for normal Navis，so I see why,you want us to go after them.
Wouldn’t the NetAgents be,more suited for this kind of,investigation work，though?
The NetAgents have had,problems gathering information,on this Queen of Darkness.
Dark Chip users rarely leave,Undernet，and their suppliers,are highly secretive.
So any NetAgents that go to,investigate would be noticed，,or even get attacked....
You two are familiar with the,Undernet，so you can,investigate discreetly.
I dunno，I’m still a bit tired.,Saving the world takes a lot,out of a girl，y’know〜
....The reward for the capture,of the Queen of Darkness,stands at 2 million Zenny.
Gotcha.,Up and at ’em Alice，time for,investigation!
Fine，okay....
Where should we start，though?,The Undernet is a big place.
We have no leads on the target,directly，but there are rumors,of an underworld info broker.
Many Undernet myths mention,an all-knowing being in a,heaven-like cyberworld.
Heaven，huh....?,We’ll keep it in mind while we,search.
Alright!,Mission start!
We’ll do our best to help with,your investigation，Reisen.
We’re currently pursuing an,Engellese suspect connected,to another case.
If you need to contact me，,we’ll be in Engelles.
